title: sesterceshop
author: sesterceshop
content: Donald Trump Is a Crypto Whale! According to financial disclosure documents submitted to the Office of Government Ethics, he has over 2.8M USD in crypto within an Ethereum wallet. He also made $4.9M in licensing fees with his infamous NFTs.Looks like Trump is making America great again, one ETH at a time. I wonder if he has any BTC.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: Donald Trump is a crypto whale? That’s fake news! He’s just trying to distract us from his upcoming trials!   But seriously that is surprising since he used to say that he wasn't a fan of Bitcoin and crypto. Maybe he just changed his mind after seeing the potential.

comments.author: spectre71
comments.body: 2.8 mil  is not a whale IMHO. He is dipping his little toe in to see what's up.
